faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

questions.principle: How does AI comic generation work?

principle.title: AI Comic Generation Process
principle.content: Our system uses advanced AI technology to transform your text into professional comic scripts and images through a two-stage process:

stage1.subtitle: AI analyzes your input
stage1.detail1: Natural language processing of your story

models.title: Available AI Models
models.content: We offer multiple AI models optimized for different use cases:

qwq32b.title: QwQ-32B Model
qwq32b.description: Our most advanced model with exceptional creative capabilities

kimi.title: Kimi Model
kimi.description: Balanced performance for general comic creation

deepseek7b.title: DeepSeek-7B Model
deepseek7b.description: Fast and efficient model for quick generation

parameters.title: Generation Parameters
parameters.content: Fine-tune your generation with advanced parameters:

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.content: Controls how closely AI follows your prompts:
guidance_scale.subtitle: Guidance Scale Settings
guidance_scale.detail2: Medium values (7-12): Balanced creativity and adherence
guidance_scale.detail4: Choose appropriate guidance based on your needs

num_inference_steps.title: Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.subtitle: Inference Steps Settings
num_inference_steps.detail1: Low steps (10-20): Fast generation, moderate quality
num_inference_steps.detail2: Medium steps (20-30): Balanced speed and quality
num_inference_steps.detail3: High steps (30-50): Highest quality, longer time
num_inference_steps.detail4: Higher steps yield more refined generation

seed.title: Random Seed
seed.subtitle: Random Seed Settings
seed.detail1: Random seed (-1): Different results each time
seed.detail3: Use same seed for consistent outputs

optimization.title: Getting Best Results
optimization.content: Follow these tips for optimal comic generation:
optimization.tip1: Provide detailed and specific story descriptions
optimization.tip2: Use clear character names and consistent traits
optimization.tip3: Specify scene atmosphere and emotional tone

cost.title: Service Pricing
cost.content: We offer flexible pricing options to meet different needs:
cost.free: Free tier with daily generation limits
cost.activation: Use activation codes for additional generations
cost.premium: Premium plans coming soon with unlimited access
cost.value: All generated content is yours to keep and use

copyright.title: Copyright and Usage Rights
copyright.content: You have full rights to use generated content:
copyright.ownership: Users retain full ownership of generated comics
copyright.commercial: Free to use for both personal and commercial purposes
copyright.restriction: Cannot claim AI model as your own creation
copyright.modification: Feel free to edit and modify

usage.title: Using Generated Comics
usage.content: Generated comics can be used in various ways:
usage.modification: Feel free to edit and enhance further

troubleshooting.title: Generation Issues and Solutions
troubleshooting.timeout: If generation times out, try shorter text or faster models
troubleshooting.quality: For poor quality, try more detailed prompts or different models
troubleshooting.consistency: Use consistent character descriptions across scenes
troubleshooting.retry: Don't hesitate to retry with adjusted parameters
